Corruption.Core.Gods.PantheonAttributeDe.label: imperial unity
Corruption.Core.Gods.PantheonAttributeDe.description: Anyone following the Imperial Cult has better relations to those factions that share their belief.

Corruption.Core.Gods.PantheonAttributeDe.label: pilgrims
Corruption.Core.Gods.PantheonAttributeDe.description: If you construct impressive places of worship, pilgrims may come to visit your colony.

Corruption.Core.Gods.PantheonAttributeDe.label: cultist mind
Corruption.Core.Gods.PantheonAttributeDe.description: Falling to chaos your pawns slowly loose most of their empathy. They have a higher chance to gain traits that counter negative thoughts from the horrors they see.

Corruption.Core.Gods.PantheonAttributeDe.label: chaos spawnings
Corruption.Core.Gods.PantheonAttributeDe.description: Your colony gains access to rituals to summon entities from the warp to help your cause.
